page.title: 07Rural Community Council
page.content: In the old school in{ Cardington} is the Bedfordshire Rural Community Council. This is a voluntary group which aims to ensure the well being of people in rural areas of Bedfordshire. They offer advice, assistance and encouragement to any voluntary organisation who approaches them. {Rural services. They offer advice on how to keep open a service that is under threat of closure, for example, a school, post office or a phone box. If for good reasons,the service has to close,then they will advise on how to create and run an alternative. {Community News} They produce a newsletter, "Network" . This keeps people up to date on rural issuses, local competitions and items of general interest.
